title: Merge up Solr Morphlines contrib code to latest external changes.
description: There are a variety of changes in the kite morphlines code that have occurred while getting the initial stuff committed - they need to be merged in.

comments.author: Patrick Hunt
comments.content: This patch moves to Morphlines 0.11.0, the latest release.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1569794 from Mark Miller in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1569794 ]

SOLR-5729: Merge in bug fixes and minor improvements for mapreduce and morphlines contribs.
